lead_paragraph: Wearing braces on both knees, Vonn extended her overall World Cup lead by placing 13th in an Alpine combined event.

headline.main: Lindsey Vonn Skis Despite Knee Injury

snippet: Wearing braces on both knees, Vonn extended her overall World Cup lead by placing 13th in an Alpine combined event.
abstract: Marie-Michele Gagnon wins Alpine combined event in Soldeu-el Tarter, Andorra, while injured Lindsey Vonn finishes 13th to extend her overall World Cup lead; other World Cup skiing news noted.
